message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product. I think you'll really love it!
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product and would like to make a counteroffer of $80.
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet at $92?
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $85.
I'm getting closer to your price, Bob, but I still need to make a profit. How about we meet at $90?
I appreciate your efforts to meet my price point, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $87.
I'm not far off from your price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $89. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement!
I understand your final offer, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $88.
I've given you a good deal, Bob. I'm not going to go any lower than $90. It's either this or I'll sell to someone else.
